body.name: Vinyl Siding Mount Compatible with Video Doorbell 1/2/3/4, ajustable Angle 30-140 degree (4" Standard Vinyl Siding Only) Bracket for Video Doorbell Not Block Doorbell Motion Sensor

features: Suitable for 4" Standard Vinyl siding，Not suitable for Triple 3 Vinyl siding or Dutchlap Vinyl siding
Full Protection&Adjustable Angle: it provide full coverage protection,The video doorbell mount allows adjusting the angle to left or right from 0 to 140 degree

Compatible Doorbells: for The doorbell mount is suitable fit for doorbell,The maximum size of video doorbell can be placed inside is 2.8 inch wide * 5.31 inch high * 1.18 inch thick. (Doorbell Not Included). Please check the left gallery picture NO.2 for the compatible models
Easy to Install,Our doorbell mount is only with two screws , just put the doorbel into our case and then fix it on the 4" vinyl siding with 2 Screws
If you have any problem with the order, Please feel free to contact us firstly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good value for quality of product. Doesn’t seem to be a dainty item that could be damaged easily. I like that it protects the overall Ring Camera Doorbell, and it has already sustained some rainy weather while keeping the doorbell pretty dry too. The installation was pretty simple and straight to the point; it was a tiny struggle due to having a certain pressure needed to keep in place while screwing it in, but nothing that was overwhelming or still couldn’t be done solo. It does have a great range of adjustability. HOWEVER, you’d have to loosen the screw if you ever wanted to adjust it a different direction or charge your doorbell (if it’s wireless).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice siding mount easy installation.
reviews.reviewText: Nice siding mount. Easy installation. Purchased a few of these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as designed, however, I have an issue.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased two of these mounts and although both work as designed, it was the second one that I had issues with. When I put the ring doorbell in the housing and slide it up in the receiver part of the mount, it would not stay in place, kept sliding down. My doorbell and housing both fell and hit the ground, luckily no damage. It was almost impossible to hold the camera and housing in place to the wall mount and try to insert the screw needed to secure in place. You may need to have a board to place underneath or someone to hold in place when inserting the screw. Screws are very tiny and if you are a tall person you will need to get on your knees to look underneath for the screw holes. Recommend having a magnetic tipped screw driver. In the picture you will see the blue up and down arrows, up arrow for the housing and down arrow referred to as the mount. They would not lock in place in order to put the screws in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mount for siding
reviews.reviewText: Works really well when there is no where to mount but siding. We had no flat surface that would mount flush for the ring at our entrance. Even if there was a spot to mount, this mount is customizable so you are able to choose which direction to point the ring. We have the wired Ring and it works great for this with holes for wiring.Just make sure to choose the correct mount for your siding option. We just had siding replaced prior so we knew our siding size.Only downside is it really sticks out and a bit bulky.This mount is under a sheltered entrance so it is not so exposed to the elements as much so cannot say how it handles rain and snow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Mounting hardware was included which made this install fast and simple. We operate our ring on the battery pack, no additional wiring. Pick the spot you want to mount, mark the holes and drill directly straight into the siding. Just make sure you have the housing perfectly vertical. The angle of adjustment was good and the hex screws keep things in place securely. This is a great option if you don’t have flat trim outside your doorway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Far So Good
reviews.reviewText: Our regular doorbell button was in an awkward location on vinyl siding. I searched high and low for a product that could easily and securely mount to siding while being able to pivot to the angle I needed. This was the only product I found so I took a chance and was not disappointed. The mount is sturdy and looks nice. It is a bit bulky but that is to be expected for what it is and does. It fit my Ring Doorbell 4 nicely and does what I need it to do. I would reccomend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and good quality
reviews.reviewText: This was delivered quickly and easy install. Feels pretty sturdy. We are super happy with the product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy!
reviews.reviewText: When I first installed this mount for my brand new Ring video doorbell, I thought that I was going to love it. It looked really nice and was not too difficult to install. The problem arose when I needed to open the mount to check the wiring on the charger that I had attached to my Ring doorbell. I was unable to remove the security screws that the manufacturer provided. Long story short, the only way I was able to remove my device was to destroy the mount! The security screws supplied by the manufacturer were substandard and had stripped when installed (even using the special screwdriver supplied). They snapped in half when I pryed the mount open. I have returned the mount for a refund.
